com.lukeleber.scandroid.gui

Class InterfaceDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.util.Collection<SelectInterface.InterfaceSelectionMode>>
      • com.lukeleber.scandroid.gui.InterfaceDetector

  •  class InterfaceDetector
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.util.Collection<SelectInterface.InterfaceSelectionMode>>
    An asynchronous task that runs the detection routine for all registered types of I/O interfaces and forwards the result to a InterfaceDetectorListener.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask

    • Method Detail

      • doInBackground

        protected java.util.Collection<SelectInterface.InterfaceSelectionMode> doInBackground(java.lang.Void... params)
        Override this method to perform a computation on a background thread. The specified parameters are the parameters passed to AsyncTask.execute(Params...) by the caller of this task. This method can call AsyncTask.publishProgress(Progress...) to publish updates on the UI thread.
        Specified by:
        doInBackground in class android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.util.Collection<SelectInterface.InterfaceSelectionMode>>
        Parameters:
        params - The parameters of the task.
        Returns:
        A result, defined by the subclass of this task.
        See Also:
        AsyncTask.onPreExecute(), AsyncTask.onPostExecute(Result), AsyncTask.publishProgress(Progress...)

      • onPostExecute

        protected final void onPostExecute(java.util.Collection<SelectInterface.InterfaceSelectionMode> modes)

        Runs on the UI thread after AsyncTask.doInBackground(Params...). The specified result is the value returned by AsyncTask.doInBackground(Params...).

        This method won't be invoked if the task was cancelled.

        Overrides:
        onPostExecute in class android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.util.Collection<SelectInterface.InterfaceSelectionMode>>
        Parameters:
        modes - The result of the operation computed by AsyncTask.doInBackground(Params...).
        See Also:
        AsyncTask.onPreExecute(), AsyncTask.doInBackground(Params...), AsyncTask.onCancelled(Object)
